Name: Harry Dean Stanton
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The choice and generosity of dash of chocolate bitters is key to the success of this boozy after dinner cocktail. Nail this and the chocolate amplifies fig and raison notes.
History: Created in 2015 by Will Howson at Tonkotsu Mare Street, London, England, and named after the American actor, musician, and singer.
Nutrition: One serving of Harry Dean Stanton contains 177 calories
